GR14ss5_bhku:9909: guruḥ śāstraṃ śraddhā rucir anugatiḥ siddhir iti me
GR14ss5_bhku:9910: yad etat tat sarvaṃ caraṇa-kamalaṃ rājati yayoḥ /
GR14ss5_bhku:9912: sadā rādhā-kṛṣṇāv śaraṇa-gatī tau mama gatiḥ //
GR14ss5_bhku:9920: [*ENDNOTE #3] Jīva's reading has aṅgirasa-śākhādhyāpakena. He also
GR14ss5_bhku:9924: punaś ca vidhinā samyak vaiṣṇavād grāhayed guroḥ // [PadmaP 6.226.1-2]
